arts.ttl: Plymouth hit back to hold 10-player Cardiff
arts.sum: Plymouth substitute Muhamed Tijani scored a 67th-minute equaliser as Argyle rescued a much-needed point from a 1-1 Championship draw at home to relegation-rivals Cardiff.

arts.ttl: Muhamed Tijani nets Plymouth equaliser in much-needed draw with 10-man Cardiff
arts.sum: The Bluebirds swept into a 14th-minute lead through Yousef Salech before Tijani came off the bench to earn a draw.

At the start of the second half, substitute Bali Mumba raced through for the hosts was brought down by Dimitrios Goutas, who was shown a straight red card for City. FINAL SCORE: PLYMOUTH ARGYLE 1-1 CARDIFF CITY

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle 1-1 Cardiff City: 10-man Bluebirds battle bravely to cling on to point in crucial clash with Pilgrims
arts.sum: The Bluebirds took on the Pilgrims in a huge match at the bottom of the Championship table

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle v Cardiff City Live: Kick-off time, TV channel and score updates
arts.sum: The Bluebirds take on the Pilgrims in a huge match at the bottom of the Championship table

arts.ttl: Liverpool to benefit from FA Cup exit against Plymouth Argyle before Champions League RO16 against PSG
arts.sum: Liverpool have been handed a tough Champions League draw as Arne Slot’s Reds will lock horns against Ligue 1 leaders PSG in the RO16 stage. Liverpool could have been drawn…

Travelling by car from Cardiff City Stadium to the home of the Pilgrims will take approximately three hours, via the M4, M49 and M5. If travelling by train from Cardiff Central, the journey to Plymouth will take approximately three-and-a-half hours.
